channel.title: [317]Trade Delay[317]
channel.description:
Could someone tell me either how to, or where i could find how to: Make a trade delay for new characters? I would really like to know. I am tired of characters spam logging and xfering to get free items. Would someone please tell me how to make a trade delay.
For ex. I want it so as soon as a person logs in for the first time it makes them wait 1hr before they can trade, and then everytime they log in it doesn't do it anymore, just for first times.
Can't believe I forgot to say this: But I think I am using either Delta or Devo. It looks, honestly, to me, kind of a mix of them. like its "sM("");" instead of "sendMessage("");" but anyway, please help!

item.title: [317]Trade Delay[317]
item.dc:creator: @Danielplanto Danielplanto

Could someone tell me either how to, or where i could find how to: Make a trade delay for new characters? I would really like to know. I am tired of characters spam logging and xfering to get free items. Would someone please tell me how to make a trade delay.

For ex. I want it so as soon as a person logs in for the first time it makes them wait 1hr before they can trade, and then everytime they log in it doesn’t do it anymore, just for first times.

Can’t believe I forgot to say this: But I think I am using either Delta or Devo. It looks, honestly, to me, kind of a mix of them. like its “sM(”");" instead of “sendMessage(”");" but anyway, please help!
